title: WWDC 2023: the 3 big reveals we need from Apple
description: The once-innovative Apple is at risk of going stale. WWDC 2023 is the perfect opportunity to change that.

title: GTA 5 took 10 years to introduce this feature and we're so pleased it's finally here
description: You can now press a button to run in GTA 5 rather than spam the action button until your thumb goes blue.

title: This new Steam update will show you the lowest price a game has sold for in the last 30 days
description: But only if you're in the EU

title: This Google Workspace security flaw could let hackers quietly steal your Drive files
description: Logging feature is only reserved for paid Google Workspace accounts and that's a problem, researchers are saying.

title: Apple rumored to be announcing major Siri updates at WWDC 2023
description: It looks as though the way that Siri launches could be changing, with more AI news also expected this week.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, June 4 (game #496)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
